title: Module Parameters: metadata_project_validator
description: Validates that the project associated with the session/subject matches expectations. Typically compares an expected project name against metadata service results and may prompt the operator on mismatch.

metadata_project_prompt.description: Prompt shown to the operator if project validation needs confirmation (e.g. mismatch).

project_name.description: Observed project name from metadata (for advanced/legacy configurations).

projects.description: List of observed/allowed projects from metadata (for advanced/legacy configurations).
